seg.translation: Erdoğan opens mosque in Cologne
Erdoğan opens mosque in Cologne
Erdoğan opens mosque in Cologne

seg.source: Der türkische Präsident Recep Tayyip Erdoğan hat am Samstag die Ditib-Moschee in Köln offiziell eröffnet.
seg.translation: The Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan officially opened the Ditib mosque in Cologne on Saturday.
Turkish president Recep Tayyip Erdoğan officially opened the Ditib mosque in Cologne on Saturday.
Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan officially opened the Ditib Mosque in Cologne on Saturday.

seg.source: Erdoğan hatte sich zuvor bei seinem dreitägigen Staatsbesuch unter anderem mit Kanzlerin Angela Merkel und Bundespräsident Frank-Walter Steinmeier getroffen.
seg.translation: During his three-day state visit, Erdoğan met with Chancellor Angela Merkel and Federal President Frank-Walter Steinmeier.
Previously in his three-day visit, Erdoğan attended meetings with Chancellor Merkel and President Steinmeier.
Erdoğan had previously met German Chancellor Angela Merkel and German President Frank-Walter Steinmeier, among others, during his three-day state visit.
Criticism of Germany
Criticism of Germany
Criticism of Germany

seg.source: In seiner Eröffnungsrede forderte Erdoğan die deutsche Regierung dazu auf, in Deutschland lebende Anhänger der Gülen-Bewegung auszuliefern und gegen kurdische Separatisten vorzugehen.
seg.translation: In his opening speech, Erdoğan called on the German government to extradite adherents of the Gülen movement living in Germany and to take action against Kurdish separatists.
In his speech, Erdoğan demanded that the German government extradite followers of the Gülen movement and take action against Kurdish separatists.
In his opening speech, Erdoğan called on the German government to extradite Gülen supporters living in Germany and to take action against Kurdish separatists.

seg.source: Wir werden unsere Bürger schützten - egal, wo sie leben.
seg.translation: We will protect our citizens wherever they live.
We will protect our citizens, no matter where they live.
We will protect our citizens, no matter where they live.

seg.source: Wir werden nicht zulassen, dass Sympathisanten der PKK oder Gülen-Bewegung unsere Bürger erschüttern und der deutsch-türkischen Freundschaft schaden", sagte er.
seg.translation: We will not allow sympathizers of the PKK or Gülen movement to unsettle our citizens and damage the German/Turkish friendship’, he said.
We will not allow PKK or Gülen sympathizers to cause our citizens unrest and damage the German-Turkish friendship", he said.
We will not allow sympathizers of the PKK or Gülen movement to upset our citizens and harm German-Turkish friendship, "he said.

seg.source: Für die Eröffnung der Ditib-Moschee war die Kölner Innenstadt teilweise gesperrt worden.
seg.translation: Inner city Cologne was partially blocked for the opening of the Ditib mosque.
Parts of Cologne city center were cordoned off for the opening of the mosque.
The city centre of Cologne was partially closed for the opening of the Ditib Mosque.

seg.source: Mehrere tausend Polizisten waren im Einsatz - unter ihnen auch Scharfschützen.
seg.translation: Many thousands of police were deployed, including snipers.
Thousands of police officers were on duty - some in riot gear.
Several thousand police officers were deployed - including snipers.

seg.source: Der Islamverband Ditib steht in der Kritik, weil er als verlängerter Arm der türkischen Regierung gilt.
seg.translation: The Ditib Islamic association is under criticism because it is seen as an extended arm of the Turkish government.
The Ditib Islamic association has been criticized as a front organization of the Turkish government.
The Islamic association Ditib is under criticism because it is seen as an extension of the Turkish government.
